enchantment.infinity_hoe.infinity.desc: Allows tilling large areas at once.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.growth_accelera: Nurtures nearby crops on a cooldown while item is held.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.autoseed.desc: Plants seeds from inventory upon till or harvest.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.chain_harvest.d: Allows harvesting large areas at once.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.untill.desc: Untill tilled land with right click. Cannot untill by falling while in inventory.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.soul_siphon.des: Reduces your maximum health temporarily to catalyze crop growth while item is held.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.rejuvenation.de: Shortly apply Regeneration with stacking potency to yourself and nearby animals on harvest.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.equinox.desc: Gain Strength on harvest with stacking duration, catalyze crop growth on hit.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.mystic_blade.de: Deal area damage on hit based on the number of enchantments and their levels.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.miner_harvest.d: Chance of double harvest increasing with Efficiency and Fortune.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.stand_united.de: Nearby players gain resistance on harvest with stacking duration.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.calcium_burst.d: Use bone meal from inventory on nearby crops on harvest.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.automata.desc: Dropped hoe harvests nearby crops by itself.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.decompose.desc: Uses nearby compostable items to repair or recharge itself while held.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.blazing.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to shoot fireballs.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.fleeting.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to gain speed. Wearing light armor gives more speed.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.leap.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to gain velocity.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.demolition.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to spawn a tnt.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.luna_dial.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to teleport to a past position.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.poison_nova.des: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to poison everything in the vicinity.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.frost_nova.desc: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to freeze everything in the vicinity.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.healing_nova.de: Gain charge on harvest. Use charge to heal everything in the vicinity.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.demeter_wrath.d: Gain charge on harvest. Charge is used on hit to deal extra magic damage.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.demeter_aegis.d: Gain charge on harvest. Charge is used while in hand to nullify incoming damage.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.demeter_grace.d: Gain charge on harvest. Charge is used while in hand to heal after taking damage.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.equivalent_exch: Gain charge on harvest. Charge is used while in hand to transform some items in inventory.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.reaper.desc: Allows using the hoe like a scythe weapon.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.sickle.desc: Allows using the hoe like a sickle weapon and provides a small damage bonus.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.rebound.desc: Allows using the hoe like a chakram weapon and slightly reduces damage.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.beetroot_specia: Chance of double harvest on beetroots.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.carrot_speciali: Chance of double harvest on carrots.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.potato_speciali: Chance of double harvest on potatoes.
enchantment.infinity_hoe.wheat_specialis: Chance of double harvest on wheat.
